questions.question: for what k, binomial expansion of (a+b)^n gives 10, for n=5 and a,b belong to N>1 ?

explanations.d: 10 is a binomial coefficient, binomial expansion can not be equal to binomial coefficient unless a=b=1

questions.question: What does the summation of a row of pascal's triangle represent

answers.a: binomial expansion of (a+b)^n and a=b=1 where n is the number of elements in the row
answers.b: binomial expansion of (a+b)^n and a=b=1 where n is the row index starting from 0 at the top of the triangle
answers.c: square of the summation of elements of the previous row

explanations.b: sum of elements of a row of pascal's triangle is twice the sum of elements of its previous row.

questions.question: How can an element can be derived using existing elements of pascal's triangle

answers.a: by adding all elements in the previous row and multiplying by k
answers.b: by adding two elements directly on top of it
answers.c: y adding all elements in the previous row and multiplying by k^2
